Addin.name: Microsoft .NET support for Mono.Debugging
Addin.author: Lluis Sanchez
Addin.description: Managed Debugging Engine support for MS.NET

DebuggerEngine.name: Microsoft .NET Debugger
DebuggerEngine.features: Tracepoints, Catchpoints, DebugFile, Stepping, Pause, Breakpoints, ConditionalBreakpoints
